title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting scalable and secure agentic AI with Bedrock AgentCore (AIM431)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Bedrock AgentCore 构建可扩展且安全的智能体 AI (AIM431)
abstract: Go deep into how AgentCore works under the hood. This technical deep-dive session breaks down the ReAct loop—how agents iteratively reason, plan, and perform tool calls to accomplish complex goals. Learn how context management, memory, and data grounding shape each reasoning step and response. Explore how AgentCore operationalizes this loop with modular services: Runtime for scalable execution, Gateway for dynamic tool and data access, Policy for deterministic controls, Observability for monitoring agent behavior, and Evaluations for continuous quality improvements. Understand how AgentCore’s architecture enables reliable, secure, and production-ready deployment of autonomous, data-driven AI agents.
abstract_cn: 深入探讨 AgentCore 的底层工作原理。本技术深度剖析会议将分解 ReAct 循环——代理如何迭代推理、规划并执行工具调用以完成复杂目标。了解上下文管理、内存和数据基础如何塑造每个推理步骤和响应。探索 AgentCore 如何通过模块化服务来操作此循环：Runtime 用于可扩展执行，Gateway 用于动态工具和数据访问，Policy 用于确定性控制，Observability 用于监控代理行为，以及 Evaluations 用于持续质量改进。理解 AgentCore 的架构如何实现可靠、安全且可用于生产环境的自主数据驱动型 AI 代理部署。
